pbi-tenant.label: Power BI - Tenant ID
pbi-tenant.help: Azure AD Tenant ID to be used for authentication.

pbi-client_id.label: Power BI - Client Id
pbi-client_id.help: The OAuth client id of the calling Azure AD application.

pbi-client_secret.label: Power BI - Client Secret
pbi-client_secret.help: The OAuth client secret of the calling Azure AD application.

pbi-dataset.label: Power BI - Dataset
pbi-dataset.help: The Power BI Dataset to send the data to.

pbi-table.label: Power BI - Table
pbi-table.help: The Power BI Table to send the data to.

aml-url.label: Azure ML Service URI
aml-url.help: Endpoint of the machine learning webservice (Request/Response method)

aml-api_key.label: Azure ML API Key
aml-api_key.help: Publisher API key to be used for authenticating requests.

fio-api_key.label: Forecast IO API Key
fio-api_key.help: Enter the generated API Key for Dark Sky Forecast.

days_to_predict.label: Number of days to predict
days_to_predict.help: Enter the number of days to predict. Must be a in numeric form. Defaults to 7
